com.coreconsulting.res.openehr.tdd2canonical.util

Class XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.coreconsulting.res.openehr.tdd2canonical.util.XML
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TDD, TDS

    public class XML
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements functionality related to generic XML handling, such as deserializing it from a File, String or URI, listing child elements, evaluating XPath expressions and serializing the contents into textual String.
    Author:
    Ricardo Gon√ßalves <ricardo.goncalves@coreconsulting.com.br>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder builder
      The DocumentBuilder instance shared to build instances of Document from different sources.
      protected org.w3c.dom.Document xml
      The Document instance.
      protected static javax.xml.xpath.XPath xpath
      XPath static instance shared for expression evaluation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XML()
      Default constructor.
      XML(java.io.File file)
      Creates a XML from a File object, expected to be a XML document available on the local filesystem.
      XML(java.lang.String string)
      Creates a XML from a String object, expected to be an in-memory textual representation of the XML document.
      XML(java.net.URI uri)
      Creates a XML from a URI, expected to be a reachable remote instance of the XML document.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> getChildElements(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
      Returns a List of children of an Node that are instances of Element.
      org.w3c.dom.NodeList getXPathAsNodeList(java.lang.String xpath)
      Runs a XPath expression on the XML and returns the results as a NodeList.
      java.lang.String getXPathAsString(java.lang.String xpath)
      Runs a XPath expression on the XML and returns the text content of the first result.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a textual representation of the Document within this XML.
      static java.lang.String toString(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      Returns a textual representation of a Document.

    • Field Detail

      • xpath

        protected static javax.xml.xpath.XPath xpath
        XPath static instance shared for expression evaluation.

      • xml

        protected org.w3c.dom.Document xml
        The Document instance.

      • builder

        transient javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder builder
        The DocumentBuilder instance shared to build instances of Document from different sources. It is transient because it can't be serialized as a field, but it can also be refactored into the constructors.

        Default constructor. Not used, but kept fro serialization purposes.

        Parameters:
